mapper.select:
SELECT c.channel_no channelNo, c.pv pv, d.nv nv, c.uv uv FROM ( SELECT a.channel_no, SUM(a.pv) pv, COUNT(DISTINCT a.mac) uv FROM statistics.channel_visit_summary_district a WHERE a.begin_time >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND a.end_time <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${startTime+span},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY a.channel_no ) c, ( SELECT COUNT(mac) nv, channel_no FROM statistics.channel_visit_summary_district a WHERE a.mac NOT IN ( SELECT b.mac FROM statistics.new_visitor b ) AND a.end_time <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND a.start_time >= FROM_UNIXTIME(${startTime-span},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY a.channel_no ) d WHERE c.channel_no = d.channel_no
AND c.channel_no = #{channelNo}

/* SELECT * FROM `api_logs_shfctv` WHERE `timestamp` <= STR_TO_DATE(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND `timestamp` >= DATE_ADD( STR_TO_DATE( NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), INTERVAL -1 HOUR) ORDER BY `timestamp` asc; */ SELECT * FROM `api_logs_shfctv` WHERE `timestamp` >= '2017-03-14 00:00:00' AND `timestamp` <= '2017-03-14 01:00:00' ORDER BY `timestamp` asc;;
SELECT * FROM api_logs_shfctv WHERE session = #{log.session} AND timestamp < #{log.timestamp} AND timestamp > DATE_ADD( STR_TO_DATE( #{log.timestamp}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ),

SELECT count(id) from api_logs_shfctv WHERE channel = #{log.channel} AND `timestamp` <= STR_TO_DATE(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND `timestamp` >= DATE_ADD( STR_TO_DATE( NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), INTERVAL -1 HOUR)

SELECT count(DISTINCT mac) from api_logs_shfctv WHERE channel = #{log.channel} AND `timestamp` <= STR_TO_DATE(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND `timestamp` >= DATE_ADD( STR_TO_DATE( NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), INTERVAL -1 HOUR)

SELECT mac FROM `api_logs_shfctv` WHERE channel = #{log.channel} AND `timestamp` <= STR_TO_DATE(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND `timestamp` >= DATE_ADD( STR_TO_DATE( NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), INTERVAL -1 HOUR) AND mac NOT IN (SELECT mac FROM new_visitor) GROUP BY mac
